additional_notes: The document contains multiple 'Important Message' forms with handwritten notes. Some information is redacted by the Department of Justice (DOJ). The document is stamped as 'GOVERNMENT EXHIBIT 2-S-R' with a reference number 'S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)'.
